data.eml:eml: A catalogue of the Fanniidae (Diptera) of the Neotropical Region

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article De Carvalho, C. J. B., Pont, A. C., Couri, M. S., Pamplona, D. (2003): A catalogue of the Fanniidae (Diptera) of the Neotropical Region. Zootaxa 219: 1-32, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156183
